thread.title: UK signee P.J. Washington playing in Kentucky this weekend
thread.title_full: UK signee P.J. Washington playing in Kentucky this weekend

title: UK signee P.J. Washington playing in Kentucky this weekend
text:
Manage UK signee P.J. Washington playing in Kentucky this weekend UK signee P.J. Washington will play a pair of games in Kentucky this weekend at the first-eve Kentucky Lake Showcase. 
Kentucky 5-star signee P.J. Washington and his nationally ranked Henderson (Nev.) Findlay Prep squad will play a pair of games in Kentucky this weekend as part of the first annual Kentucky Lake Showcase at Marshall County High School. 
Can't wait to play in Kentucky this weekend üôèüèæüîµ‚ö™Ô∏èBBN ‚Äî PJ Washington (@pjwashington_25) February 15, 2017 
Findlay Prep (27-3), who is ranked No. 6 in the country, will go head-to-head with Hopkinsville (Ky.) Friday at 7:30 PM CT and Tennessee Prep at 6:30 PM CT Saturday. 
Hopkinsville is one of the better teams in Kentucky, sporting a 22-5 record. 
Get the latest UK news sent straight to your inbox with out EMAIL NEWSLETTER 
Washington (6-8, 229), who is ranked 13th overall in the 2017 class according to the 247Sports Composite , committed to and signed with the Wildcats in November. 
On the season, he is leading the Pilots in scoring (19.9 ppg), rebounds (9.5 rpg), assists (5.5 apg) and blocks (1.8 bpg) and is second in steals (2.0 spg). 
Washington has already been named to both the McDonald's All-American Game and Jordan Brand Classic. 
The Kentucky Lake Showcase will also feature 5-star prospects DeAndre Ayton (Arizona), Gary Trent Jr. (Duke) and Paul Scruggs (Xavier). 
Tickets are available at the event and at TheGrindSession.com . 
You can view the full schedule below. 
Is UK's #BBN as crazy as everyone says?Future Cat @pjwashington_25 will play twice in KY this wknd!Will the #BBN show up to support? pic.twitter.com/KNcGYgr2UN
